TextoBemVindo: You don't have an account yet! Create your account and join us.
Verifique: Check your email and confirm your account in order to access it.
Caso: If you have not received the email, click the button below to resend the request:
NomeMinimo: Name must be at least 1 character long.
NomeMaximo: Name must be a maximum of 100 characters.
NomeUsuarioMinimo: Username must be at least 4 characters long.
NomeUsuarioMaximo: Username must be a maximum of 20 characters.
NomeUsuarioInvalido: Invalid username, cannot contain spaces or special characters.
DataNascimentoObrigatoria: The date is mandatory. You must be at least 13 years old to register.
TermosUsoObrigatorio: You must accept the terms of use.
PoliticaPrivacidadeObrigatoria: You must accept the privacy policy.
